alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 1:02PM EDT until April 09 at 3:30AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sacandaga River At Hope. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8 feet, Water floods NY Route 30 near the Hope town garage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:31 PM EDT Friday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:31 PM EDT Friday was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 4.5 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 7 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.1 feet on 03/18/1973. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Sacandaga River Hope Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Fri 12 pm: 8.2 Forecast: Fri 2 pm 8.0 Fri 8 pm 7.2 Sat 2 am 6.4 Sat 8 am 6.0 Sat 2 pm 5.8 Sat 8 pm 5.5 Sun 2 am 5.2 Sun 8 am 5.0 Sun 2 pm 4.8 Sun 8 pm 4.7 Mon 2 am 4.6 Mon 8 am 4.5 &&
